Vehicle status is currently set to NotActive, but data acquisition (Fetching) is still active. Reactivating the Active status will not affect the data acquisition state. Please ensure that the signed consents, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to confirm

Vehicle status has been verified as NotFetching. Are you sure you want to set the status to Fetching (enable data acquisition)? Please ensure that the signed consents, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to confirm

Are you sure you want to set this vehicle's status to NotActive? Please ensure that the signed consents, from the specific company, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to confirm
It is not allowed to set a Vehicle to NotFetching (disable data acquisition) while it is in Active status

Vehicle status has been verified as NotActive. Do you authorize setting the status to NotFetching (disable data acquisition) for this Vehicle? Please ensure that the signed consents, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to confirm
